column2: Stories tell of many magical artifacts lost in the desert sands...
The Fire Emblem and regalia weapons will be inherited within a dynasty when possible.
Mages are usually more philosphical than religious, and will not declare holy war.
Members of the Elimine Church will only wage holy war against heretics.
If the Fire Emblem is not within the Kingdom of Bern, the heir's coming-of-age ceremony cannot be completed...
A loyal Demon Dragon can create War Dragons for your armies.
The Lycian League must be reformed into a proper kingdom before its nobles will accept changes to most laws.
Nergal has lived for centuries, but his personal empire is unlikely to survive his death...
Regalia weapons can be unearthed by characters who know where they are hidden and are driven to find them.
Don't declare war on one of the Eight Legends.
Manaketes should avoid combat if an enemy commander carries a Divine Weapon.
